targets.query: SELECT last("value") / 1000 FROM "cpu_temperature" WHERE ("host" = 'vader') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") / 1000 FROM "cpu_temperature" WHERE ("host" = 'deathstar-01') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") / 1000 FROM "cpu_temperature" WHERE ("host" = 'deathstar-02') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") / 1000 FROM "cpu_temperature" WHERE ("host" = 'eadu') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(usage_user) as "user"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" ='vader' and cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean(usage_user) as "user"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" ='deathstar-01' and cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean(usage_user) as "user"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" ='deathstar-02' and cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean(usage_user) as "user"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" ='eadu' and cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean(total) FROM "disk" WHERE "host" ='deathstar-01' AND "path" ='/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(used) FROM "disk" WHERE "host" ='deathstar-01' AND "path" ='/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(total) FROM "disk" WHERE "host" ='deathstar-02' AND "path" ='/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(used) FROM "disk" WHERE "host" ='deathstar-02' AND "path" ='/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(total) FROM "disk" WHERE "host" ='vader' AND "path" ='/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(used) FROM "disk" WHERE "host" ='vader' AND "path" ='/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(total) FROM "disk" WHERE "host" ='eadu' AND "path" ='/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(used) FROM "disk" WHERE "host" ='eadu' AND "path" ='/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(used) as used FROM "mem" WHERE host ='vader' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean(used) as used FROM "mem" WHERE host ='deathstar-01' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean(used) as used FROM "mem" WHERE host ='deathstar-02' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean(used) as used FROM "mem" WHERE host ='eadu' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host ='vader' AND interface=~/eth0/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*-8 as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host ='vader' AND interface=~/eth0/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host ='deathstar-01' AND interface=~/eth0/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*-8 as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host ='deathstar-01' AND interface=~/eth0/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host ='deathstar-02' AND interface=~/eth0/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*-8 as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host ='deathstar-02' AND interface=~/eth0/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host ='eadu' AND interface=~/eth0/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*-8 as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host ='eadu' AND interface=~/eth0/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
